title: Water mains, telephone lines, inter-com lines, gas pipes or any other service line shall not be laid in the duct for electric cables
clause_text: Water mains, telephone lines, inter-com lines, gas pipes or any other service line shall not be laid in the duct for electric cables.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Water mains, telephone lines, inter-com lines, gas pipes or any other service line shall not be laid in the duct for electric cables.
